appStore.title: Cashbag App

refundTime.title: Time to refund
refundTime.rule2: You will receive a refund on the 25th of the following month

beforeBuy.title: Before you click Buy Now
beforeBuy.rule1: Only refunds apply on Shopee application. You need to download the app before buying.
beforeBuy.rule2: Refund only for 1 cart created after each "Buy Now" click
beforeBuy.rule3: Shopee maximum refund of VND 150,000 / order

failure.title: You failed refunds?
failure.rule1: Cancel, change, shop bombs, create shop and buy goods to receive commission
failure.rule2: Shopee only refunds the items on the Cashbag app
failure.rule3: You have not installed the shopee application on the phone
